name: RACodingGapStatusCodeSystem
title: Risk Adjustment Coding Gap Status Code System
description: This is a code system for coding gap status.

concept.display: Coding gap invalidated patient never had the condition
concept.definition: Patient was incorrectly diagnosed and has never had this condition.

concept.display: Coding gap invalidated condition no longer active
concept.definition: Patient was correctly diagnosed, but the condition is no longer active.
Patient has an active condition, but the gap doesnâ€™t accurately describe it.
